column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Toronto must be a place where police serve and protect everyone , all interest groups , all religions and races , not simply the politicians and lawyers that protect their excessive budgets .
#Text=Toronto must be a place where anyone can ride public transit for a small fee to anywhere in the GTA .

#Text=Toronto City council must be a place where everyone has a voice , and who 's ideas may be shared in resolving the challenges that face this nation in the twenty second century , and not simply a voice for the realty firms and lawyers that charge outrageous service charges .
#Text=Toronto is this , but can be much more .
#Text=Q :
#Text=Which council decision ( since the 2003 election ) do you feel the city/your ward should be most proud of , and which was least desirable ?
#Text=A :
#Text=1 ) Great to see sheppard subway built to fairview mall , and integration of VIVA tertiary transit system with TTC .
#Text=2 ) I believe building Daniels condominiums along 401 and bayview was more financial than environmental .
#Text=It would be better to alleviate transit congestion by building along steeles ave east and west , including a steeles subway extension from keele to mccowan .
#Text=The 401 cannot grow further , and adding more transit chaos to it is not good for environment , nor city planning .
#Text=Further growth must come from Etobicoke and Scarborough fringes - if not a merger of Toronto and York region for tax revenue purposes .
#Text=3 ) I do not agree with city council that the greatest value in expanding the subway system was from fairview mall to yonge .
#Text=If this city and province had given the global authroity to the GTA transit authority as I demanded in 2003 , we would have a GTA transit system second to Tokyo or New York ,
#Text=Q :
#Text=If you were elected as a " rookie " councilor , What would you bring to the table beyond the incumbent ?
#Text=A :
#Text=I am no rookie in any sense , in fact I have been the advisor and consultant that has not charged Toronto a dime for all of my research and publications the past 5 years .
#Text=I transformed the University of Toronto into Canada 's pre-eminent R+D institution , fully integrated with downtown hospital infrastructure .
#Text=I am the one that told Ontario to reform gaming laws so hospitals and charities could fund this transformation today .
#Text=I am the one that has forced the Attorney General to offer NO FEE courts , funds to rebuild Regent Park , VIVA tertiary transit system , and a host of other achievements .
#Text=1 ) 10 years of business , IT , Finance , and Environmental solutions consulting in applying to Toronto 's current problems .
#Text=2 ) The knowledge , experience , and innovative ideas that have transformed this city , province , and nation in the past decade .
#Text=3 ) I hold the balance of power against all three levels of government and police service unions .
#Text=When I choose to use that power , it will result in swift , decisive reforms as those within the past couple of years .
